comment: Love wantintin Yeah , we know love is sweet , but do you want to know what is sweeter ? Being aware of the legal implications of marriage before you jump right into it . <URL>
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / want-01

            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 w2
                  :ARG1 (s / sweet-03
                        :ARG1 (l / love-01))))
      :snt2 (w3 / want-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (k2 / know-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 s
                              :ARG1 t)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / more))))
      :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
      :snt3 (r / realize-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (ii / implicate-01
                  :ARG0 (m3 / marry-01)
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / legal-02))
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (j / jump-03
                        :ARG0 y
                        :destination m3
                        :mod (r2 / right)))))

comment: There are many legal implications of marriage that many people fail to consider . Let s highlight some : Averagely , many people assume that a woman would take the last name of her husband once they get married . But should you always assume ? No ! ! <URL>
amr:

      :snt1 (ii / implicate-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / marry-01)
            :quant (m3 / many)
            :ARG1-of (c / consider-02
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :quant (m4 / many))
                  :ARG2-of (f / fail-01
                        :ARG1 p)))
      :snt2 (h / highlight-01

            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (s / some))
      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / assume-02
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :quant (m5 / many))
                  :ARG1 (t / take-01
                        :ARG0 (w2 / woman)
                        :ARG1 (n / name
                              :mod (l / last)
                              :poss (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91

                                          :ARG2 (h3 / husband))))
                        :time (m6 / marry-01

                  :ARG1-of (a2 / average-04))
            :ARG2 (r / recommend-01

                        :time (a4 / always))))

comment: Before you get married to your spouse , you need to talk about whether or not you are willing to change your name or if your spouse is willing to adopt your name . Don t just assume , discuss this with your spouse first . <URL>
amr:

                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a / amr-choice
                        :op1 (w / will-02

                              :polarity -

                                          :ARG1 y

                              :ARG1 (a2 / adopt-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (n3 / name
                                          :poss y)))))
            :time (b / before
